title: Rest in Peace Veigar: Memorial and Wake
body:
This is a thread for all the veigar mains where we can pay our respect and remember the tiny dark master of evil.

Veigar, you were my first main and you were the funnest champ to play.  You were too beautiful and so they had to destroy you.

replies.body:
RIP veig.

I too was a veig main. (note past-tense) Just tried the changes, and it feels like I'm not even playing veig anymore. He's just too different, too **unreliable** I felt almost completely powerless in the game I just played, despite having 230 q stacks and just my ult alone 100-10 the enemy veig.

I picked veig up solely because of 2 reasons:

1. he was easy to play. Simple and straight forward press q, do dmg, land stun? full combo nuff said

2. he was **reliable!** that means I can trust him to perform well in all situations, and if he did not do so, it was because **I** screwed up, not because the enemy picked a better champ and "out played" me.

It is such a terrible feeling when you do everything you know you should do, the way it should be done, and still fail because of what the enemy did, rather than you simply screwing up.

One core reason I pick veigar going into matches is because he can catch ppl out of position and punish them for it. I can't do that anymore. The delay on his stun completely destroys any attempt to do so. Even if I center my gate **directly** on the enemy champ, they can still **WALK** out of it. Not only does that put me **dangerously** closer to the enemy than I need to be, but it also means that I am guaranteed to "miss" my stun every time I cast it, even if it does stun some ppl.

What I mean by a guaranteed "miss" is that if old veig missed his stun, he was screwed. That, or the enemy just walks away, depending on their position.  

The game I just played, the enemy team had a talon top. When talon started roaming, I had enough dmg to kill him, but without any means of cc'ing talon before he jumped on me, I was a free kill. There was no possible way for me to "counter play" the enemy talon short of dropping my stun long before he was in range to jump on me and run away as fast as I could. It felt terrible. I had plenty of dmg to kill him, but I just could not get in range to do so due to him being able to kill me before I stunned him.


tl;dr - Good job riot, veigar now has "counter play." It's a shame I'll never be using that lovely Final Boss veigar skin again, cuz veig is just utter trash now. Hope yer happy, cuz I really did like that skin.

Relax. Ranked rank is irrelevant because it was a team builder game, my team builder MMR is diamond, so all players in that game are diamond level, they just don't play ranked as much. Like me for example, who's unranked, but I've played nearly 10,000 games of league with all modes combined, and I perform at a diamond level. My team builder games have diamond, master, and challenger players in them.

Ignorance isn't a bad thing, and it's not an insult, so relax your insults. Veigar isn't ruined at all and is still a very strong champ. The only bad thing about his changes is the stun delay, which ruins the ability to land the edge right on a champ and instead you have to hope enemies run into it.

Ignorance is the lack of knowledge which in a discussion can be detrimental to your argument. Basically it can render you comment useless such as in this case. 

People like you keep saying Veigar is too strong yet he's never banned and rarely played in the upper ranks. This is usually a pretty strong indicator that he's lacking something to make him valuable to the team. Nerfing him will just make him disappear from the game completely. 

I've had many of my favourites nerfed and I still play them but this would be a first time I drop char due to a nerf.

That's kind of the problem.  hitting E (and thus W) is no longer within your control at all.  If anything this just shifted his power from E to Q, thereby nullifying half his kit and making him all the more susceptible to {{item:3102}}.

Also, this isn't a whine thread.

You were my first, my favorite, and my fun little evil yordle pal. Im going to miss you, as I probably wont see you on Summoners Rift anymore.......I'll miss your evil laugh, the awesome skins you had, and most of all the fun times we had with your waddle-walk. I remember picking up Veigar in season 2. I sucked with him, so I decided I'd just stick with top and ADC.

pre-season 3 I picked him up again, and let me tell you it was like re-uniting with a long-lost friend. I'd improved, and it felt like Veigar improved. Deleting people, playing it super cautiously when walking through an unwarded jungle when going to place a key ward that'd let me steal Baron/Dragon, kill someone while they were trying to farm, or securing an escape point.

Season 4 comes around and I still play Veigar whenever I need to mid as my 'safe' pick. Nuking down AP while occasionally dying to them, dying in the blink of an eye to a Master Yi who worked his way around the team to flank and kill me specifically.

These... These were fantastic times. Fun times.

RIP in Peace little bro, you were my favourite thing about this game. I uninstalled, id rather remember all the good times i had with you when you were actually the tiny master of evil then have the memory tainted by this pitiful abomination thats using your name. it just makes me so sad to think you'll never land a stun again... no more will people feel the crushing blow of dark matter... goodbye old friend

I cant 1v1 anyone in mid anymore as veigar cause my dmg is unreliable like people have said. I cant land my w, if they are actually a goo player e will never land. Q's range is soooo short meaning i have to get close to even harass. I used to be able to dominate annies in lane. But now it seems like i should just start playing annie. Veigar is litierial free elo now. 

Thanks Riot

Veigar, you were the guy who inspired me to give fanfictions a go (EUW forums are gone too so... RIP EUW GD too :/ ), and I still feel like a Veigar being rivals with Syndra could work very hilariously. I bought you just because you looked cute AND evil, without even checking your skills or playstyle (yes I was a noob), but I loved your kit anyway. I will remember my first game, when I ulted a full health full tank Garen just because it seemed right, without doing much damage.

I will remember the few games I managed to win against Zed or Yasuo with perfect stun timing and outplaying their mobility. I will remember defending you whenever some of my premades told me you were trash-tier. I will remember yelling at people picking you as a support after C9 did it, just because I respect you too much as a tormenter of souls that seeks to farm his AP all day.

I will never forget your laughs, and I will still try to get someone at Riot to give you a spotlight before you are finally buried next to Urgot and Evelynn. Hope Syndra and you finally overcome your differences in Tier 4 :') 

Part of me is still glad those changes happened now instead of later, as I was this close to buying your amazing legendary skin.

RIP friend, I will never get another champion that feels like he is so mad at his own summoner (which also got removed, RIP summoners)
